ProjectTitle: Engineering viral vectors for high-throughput CRISPR genetic screens in plants
InitialFeedbackHistory: 24/11/2023 [REDACTED] use of data repositories to make your data FAIR, I suggest that besides RDR you also look at repositories for the life sciences, as for some of your data types those will be more relevant.
